entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (death_watch_foreman.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_101: I don't really have time for this right now, sorry.
entries.s_103: Yeah, well I guess it was to much to ask of a complete stranger but I was hoping that it would all work out. Wish us luck because we are going to need it.
entries.s_107: Ok fine I will do this for you but you are going to owe me.
entries.s_109: Deal. Now listen those pumps can be tricky. Generally when you trip one of the valves it causes the one or ones next to it on the circuit to flip as well.  You will have to play with it for a while in order to get them all online. Also we really don't have a lot of time so if you are not back soon I am going to have to see if there is anything else I can do to get it on.
entries.s_111: Deal. Now listen those pumps can be tricky. Generally when you trip one of the valves it causes the one or ones next to it on the circuit to flip as well.  You will have to play with it for a while in order to get them all online. There isn't much time...oh yeah, and try not to destroy the pumps while you are at it.
entries.s_113: I don't really have time for this right now, sorry.
entries.s_115: Yeah, well I guess it was to much to ask of a complete stranger but I was hoping that it would all work out. Wish us luck because we are going to need it.
entries.s_120: What is the other problem with the drill?
entries.s_122: What is the other problem with the drill?
entries.s_1265571c: So I will have to take the battery from him by force?
entries.s_127: I don't really have time for this right now, sorry.
entries.s_129: Yeah, well I guess it was to much to ask of a complete stranger but I was hoping that it would all work out. Wish us luck because we are going to need it.
entries.s_140: You make Mandalorian armor out of this ore?
entries.s_142: Hey all I know is that this stuff is used in the making of the armor. They keep a pretty tight watch on how much of this stuff we mine, but I know I can sneak you some every now and again. Here you go. If you check back with me occasionally, I should be able to sneak you out some more. Not too often mind you, but I will do my best.
entries.s_144: This is the same ore that the Mandalores use to make their armor. I am willing to sneak you some but you are going to need to make some room in your inventory so I can.
entries.s_145fd34: Not yet, but I will get this battery cleaned soon.
entries.s_1511575f: Hey you are back again. You know Haldo is still running around down here with our battery. Are you sure you don't want to give us a hand and try to get it back for us?
entries.s_18426338: Hey all I know is that this stuff is used in the making of the armor. They keep a pretty tight watch on how much of this stuff we mine, but I know I can sneak you some every now and again. Here you go. If you check back with me occasionally, I should be able to sneak you out some more. Not too often mind you, but I will do my best.
entries.s_19ecd0cd: Have you sent anyone out to try to find Haldo?
entries.s_1b208070: Hey you managed to get all of the pumps online and to my knowledge didn't destroy all of them in the process. That is surprising considering your track record for violence. Well a deal is a deal so tell you what I will get you some of this ore that we are mining.
entries.s_1d1d45a9: Hey it is you again. Glad to see you are still breathing. If you have come looking for ore I am sorry but I can't sneak you out any right now. The Mandalorians are running inventory right now and will notice anything that is missing. Check back with me later.
entries.s_1fe41c46: It's this blasted laser they have us working with. Dumb thing never works right and then when we finally did get it working again, Haldo went off his rocker, ripped its battery out, and took off with it.
entries.s_2236f9d7: If he is sick is there anyway to help him?
entries.s_23237572: I would love to but the Mandalorians keep track of who comes and goes from the workshop. If one of us goes in they will ask why and I would rather they didn't know about the whole Haldo incident. Since you are a stranger they will just correctly assume you are an intruder and try to kill you...which they probably have been doing anyways.
entries.s_23cbff5d: Choice is yours. We will figure out some other way to get them online I suppose.
entries.s_26: Ok I will go see what I can do for your co-worker.
entries.s_262e7b86: Deal. Now listen those pumps can be tricky. Generally when you trip one of the valves it causes the one or ones next to it on the circuit to flip as well.  You will have to play with it for a while in order to get them all online. Also we really don't have a lot of time so if you are not back soon I am going to have to see if there is anything else I can do to get it on.
entries.s_26fa42a7: Yes I will see if I can find him for you.
entries.s_27b9acbc: Thank you for helping Haldo and getting the battery back for us. Now we can get back to....oh no! The battery's connections are all covered with dirt and grime. Haldo must have got them dirty after he took it.
entries.s_286d283f: The drill uses a liquid coolant system in order to keep it from overheating and exploding. Well the problem is that we are not getting any pressure down here so if we turn on the drill...BOOM!
entries.s_29: I am sorry but I don't really have time to help your sick co-worker.
entries.s_2de77a24: Why aren't you getting any work done?
entries.s_3055077f: I don't really have time for this right now, sorry.
entries.s_31: That is pretty much what I expected. I would have been shocked if a complete stranger such as yourself offered to help us out.
entries.s_31e8b478: That is up to you. If you change your mind come on back.
entries.s_3310d1b6: I guess I should thank you for getting us the battery back but you didn't have to kill Haldo. He was sick in the head from the fumes and the medicine from the medical droid could have cured him.
entries.s_35: Maybe I can help you track down Haldo.
entries.s_3b67f1eb: Ok, please hurry because the Mandalorians will be wondering where their ore is shortly.
entries.s_3f363bf3: No need to be sarcastic. The Mandalorians keep us under a pretty tight watch down here. They don't really trust anyone who isn't Mandalorian and then they will only partially trust you.
entries.s_42: Haldo? Who is Haldo and why would he take the battery?
entries.s_44557f4a: It is located upstairs in the medical lab. One of the medical droids should be able to give it to you. They don't require any special code or anything to help you out. At least they didn't last time I used them but the Mandalorians don't really consult us when they make changes to things around here.
entries.s_44bb7cbc: What is the other problem with the drill?
entries.s_45d9624a: Yeah, well there is a cure. We would have gone and got it, but the Mandalorians don't much care for us wandering around when we are supposed to be working, so none of us have gone up to get it.
entries.s_471cd71d: That would be a lifesaver. No one else is willing to go out and try to find him. Guys who get hit with alum sickness generally are unstable and sometimes can be quite dangerous.
entries.s_4af1601a: So you are back? We still don't have any water pressure down here maybe you would like to head back up and try again?
entries.s_4d8102d5: In an odd sort of way, that makes sense. Ok, I will do it.
entries.s_4e099c6a: So who is this Haldo guy who ran off with your battery?
entries.s_4f17ac67: Have you managed to find Haldo yet? We really need that battery back before the Mandalorians come down here to check up on our progress.
entries.s_51b7892e: Well you see the problem is the Mandalorians have been monitoring our use of workshop. If one of us goes, they will ask why and then find out about Haldo. If you go, then they will just know a stranger has been in here. Since they will most likely try to kill you on sight, I figured there wouldn't be any harm done.
entries.s_52f3e83e: This is the same ore that the Mandalores use to make their armor. I am willing to sneak you some but you are going to need to make some room in your inventory so I can.
entries.s_54ee97f2: I don't really have time to deal with this right now.
entries.s_57097d43: Don't worry about me and the Mandalorians. I can handle them.
entries.s_579c9bc5: Well that battery doesn't really do us alot of good in its current state. Why don't you hold onto it and if you do get a chance run it over to the workshop and get it cleaned. We would really appreciate it.
entries.s_5af847c7: You are going to have to clear out some inventory space in order for me to give you any more of this ore.
entries.s_5c4119d: No need to be sarcastic. The Mandalorians keep us under a pretty tight watch down here. They don't really trust anyone who isn't mandalorian and then they will only partially trust you.
entries.s_5dbddef: How do you get it cleaned off?
entries.s_6204ccac: Good point. Ok I will take the battery to the workshop.
entries.s_637e6c80: I have received authorization from the Mandalorians.
entries.s_63fae5b4: You know I can't thank you enough. Without your help there is no way we could get this job completed on time.
entries.s_645da2b5: I asked for volunteers but no one was willing to go search. Not that I blame them, I don't even want to go out and try to find him. People with alum sickness become real messed up in the head. You never know what they are going to do. A lot of times they get really violent.
entries.s_6864fcd4: Good. Once you get those pumps back online come on back and we will discuss what I owe you.
entries.s_687ef712: Haldo? Who is Haldo and why would he take the battery?
entries.s_6b8a415c: Remember those pumps can be tricky. Generally when you trip one of the valves it causes the one or ones next to it on the circuit to flip as well.  You will have to play with it for a while in order to get them all online.
entries.s_6c1f32dd: Where can I find this cure?
entries.s_6d069da0: You're braver then I will ever be. But if you really are that tough, maybe you would like to help recover our drill battery that Haldo ran off with?
entries.s_71ad5afa: I am sorry but I don't really have time to help your sick co-worker.
entries.s_728cbacc: Why don't one of you go take it to the workshop?
entries.s_787e689e: I figured you would be up for that whole danger thing. Once the treadwell has cleaned the battery, come on back to me so we can get that battery installed back into the drill.
entries.s_7a654750: Work in the loosest sense of the word. Although we are not really getting a whole lot of work done at this moment.
entries.s_7b9dc7c7: Have you managed to get that battery cleaned yet?
entries.s_7d2eea07: So what are you all doing down here?
entries.s_7d65b570: What sort of work are you doing?
entries.s_7fe1c6d7: Let me guess. It's something that your guys can't do either.
entries.s_81b8b95b: Yeah, yeah...whatever you say there pally. I wouldn't want to be in your shoes if the Mandalorians catch you down here bothering their miners.
entries.s_82599d96: Sounds fun. But didn't you say you weren't getting much done?
entries.s_83d1549d: What do you need in order to get water pressure down here?
entries.s_8405256c: Deal. Now listen those pumps can be tricky. Generally when you trip one of the valves it causes the one or ones next to it on the circuit to flip as well.  You will have to play with it for a while in order to get them all online. There isn't much time...oh yeah, and try not to destroy the pumps while you are at it.
entries.s_85: I don't really have time for this right now, sorry.
entries.s_87: Well that battery doesn't really do us a lot of good in its current state. Why don't you hold onto it and if you do get a chance run it over to the workshop and get it cleaned. We would really appreciate it.
entries.s_8bbe4b84: Maybe I can help you track down Haldo.
entries.s_8dc6968d: Hey, what are you doing down here? You shouldn't be walking around down here unless you are working or the Mandalorians authorized you to be here and you certainly don't have the look of a miner.
entries.s_8deeb761: It's old technology. The Mandalorians don't exactly splurge on mining equipment. In fact if you haven't noticed already nothing around here is exactly in tip top shape.
entries.s_8f36c784: Ok, well if you change your mind you know where I am.
entries.s_93: What is the other problem with the drill?
entries.s_95879f15: Hey it is not just any ore. This is the stuff that the Mandalorians use in their armor. They keep a pretty careful track of what we mine but I know that I can sneak you some of this stuff without them noticing it.
entries.s_968923c1: Sounds to me like you should be happy you're not working.
entries.s_9b4dd6c7: Yeah, I suppose you did. Let me take a look at it. Oh no, this battery isn't going to do us any good. Look here all the connections on it are covered with dirt and grime. Now it is going to have to be cleaned off.
entries.s_9bea7011: Ok, cool your jets. I am on it.
entries.s_9cf7119e: We won't get a good solid connection and the drill won't fire is what will happen. I hate to ask but could you perhaps take this battery over to the workshop and have one of treadwell clean it up?
entries.s_9e37f61f: Another stranger? The Mandalorians must be really slacking on their defenses lately. Oh well, none of my business. I am sorry but I really have to get back to work right now, maybe I will have time to talk to you later.
entries.s_a33b6055: Let me guess. It is something that your guys can't do either.
entries.s_a618b93a: No thanks, I think I will avoid the workshop if it is monitored.
entries.s_ac0e598b: Its this blasted laser they have us working with. Dumb thing never works right and then when we finally did get it working again, Haldo went off his rocker, ripped it's battery out, and took off with it.
entries.s_b491aba5: You are still using liquid coolant for you laser drill?
entries.s_b4feb773: We don't really have a whole lot to give but I will tell you what. I can sneak you some of this ore that we are mining. Now before you get all mad about just getting ore let me tell you that this is the stuff that the Mandalores use in their armor.
entries.s_b5a845f9: Ok, I will take it over to the workshop for you.
entries.s_b75a73ed: Yeah right. The Mandalorains are expecting their ore and they don't much like excuses. If we can't get this drill back online and get back on schedule...well lets just say I prefer to it not coming to that.
entries.s_b7c0824: That is the best news that I have heard all day. If you get that battery come on back to me and I will see about getting this drill back online.
entries.s_b99aaac2: No thanks, I can't figure out how to get those pumps to work.
entries.s_baac9005: I don't really have time to rescue your battery.
entries.s_bc5213a: Just speak to the treadwell when you are in there and he will take care of the dirty battery. Oh and try not to kill him while you are there. We sort of need him for repairs around this place.
entries.s_bdb717fb: What happens if the battery connections are dirty?
entries.s_c04f0d0d: I risked my life for some ore?
entries.s_c1dc6296: I don't know how you managed to get those pumps working without the Mandalorians taking you out. You must be a lot tougher then you look. I can't thank you enough for all your help.
entries.s_c2d12633: Haldo was one of the men on my crew. My guess is that his rebreather wasn't working properly and he breathed too much of the alum fumes. Blasted air vents haven't been working right either, so we have been using our masks a lot.
entries.s_c7f1e2ee: Hey now! I didn't say anything about using force on him. He is sick and there is a cure up in the medical lab. Granted there have been a few cases where alum sickness will make a person so demented that they can't come back, but Haldo has only been ill for a little while.
entries.s_c825f420: Not yet, but I am still looking for him.
entries.s_ce027a15: Ok I will go see what I can do for your co-worker.
entries.s_d1b18b50: It is located upstairs in the medical lab. One of the medical droids should be able to give it to you. They don't require any special code or anything to help you out. At least they didn't last time I used them, but the Mandalorians don't really consult us when they make changes to things around here.
entries.s_d1eff807: Could you do us one more favor and take this battery over to the workshop. The treadwell in there can clean it off without any problems.
entries.s_d4b1da9f: Ok fine I will do this for you but you are going to owe me.
entries.s_d62e85a9: You wanted the battery back and I got it back for you.
entries.s_d8f6c63f: Yeah, well I guess it was to much to ask of a complete stranger but I was hoping that it would all work out. Wish us luck because we are going to need it.
entries.s_d9db9b00: Hey your back. I am sorry but right now we are having a bit of a crisis. I know I told you to hurry back but right now I simply don't have any time to talk to you. Could you please come back to me in a little while.
entries.s_dbf0d0f9: Thank you, I could really use some more of that.
entries.s_dc1d4717: Sounds to me like you should be happy your not working.
entries.s_dd657c44: Sure, I will come back to you as soon as I get it cleaned.
entries.s_dd6f26cc: We mine for the alum that the Mandalores use to make their armor. Basically, we get to work down in these nasty caves all day long so the Mandalorians can look nice.
entries.s_dd7c0dd3: Hey, you're back. I was sort of half expecting you not to return. Oh yeah, this is excellent. The battery is clean and ready to be installed in the drill. Unfortunately there is one other issue that we are having.
entries.s_de4a182e: What are you doing back here. We still don't have any water pressure down here. I am telling you that we don't have very much time left.
entries.s_de774e37: Great. Now remember there is some medicine in the medical lab that should be able to help him out. And once you get that battery bring it on back to me so we can get this drill working again.
entries.s_e1dd8e6e: Good to see you again my friend. I was able to secure some more of this ore for you. If you need some more check back with me later and maybe I can sneak some more out under the noses of the Mandalorians.
entries.s_e55f453d: Yes, I will give it another shot.
entries.s_e5e9e886: Upstairs there is a pump room. There are four pumps that all need to be on in order to get the water down to us. Unfortunately the circuit breakers on those things are all ancient and trip at the slightest surge. If you could maybe go up there and turn them all on for us I know we could get underway.
entries.s_e83ca277: I guess it isn't that bad. The Mandalorians don't pay us a whole lot but they generally don't directly mistreat any of us unless we do something to make them mad...which doesn't seem that hard to do. Hmmmm...now that I think about it this isn't the best life but it is better then telling them we quit.
entries.s_ed0d4e5a: You make Mandalorian armor out of this ore?
entries.s_f46d76f6: Hey you are back. I was sort of half expecting you not to return. Oh yeah, this is excellent. The battery is clean and ready to be installed in the drill. And you didn't destroy the treadwell...that's a plus. Unfortunately there is one other issue that we are having.
entries.s_f4fd5da3: That is the best news that I have heard all day. If you get that battery, come on back to me and I will see about getting this drill back online.
entries.s_f501c596: No thanks, I can't look for him right now.
entries.s_f73c5ae7: Where can I find this cure if I decide to help out?
entries.s_f7962ef3: Can't you have one of your other guys take care of this?
entries.s_f79fa021: That is pretty much what I expected. I would have been shocked if a complete stranger such as yourself offered to help us out.
entries.s_fb5cf4cd: Ok, please hurry. I am sure that we don't have a whole lot of time left. Once you get the battery come back to me as quick as you can.
